Name: Merchant of Venice
Ingredients: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The richness and flavour of honey along with bittersweet aperitivo liqueur jointly balance lemon citrus notes in this majestic vodka-based cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2010 at Eclipse Bar in Barcelona, Spain.
Nutrition: One serving of Merchant of Venice contains 201 calories
